definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:KilledTheHex</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:KilledTheHex</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:KilledTheHex</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_text"><field name="VAR">global:HasHexBeenKilled</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Destroyed</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
